metadata.name: Two Sides
metadata.description:
A collaborative piece called 'Two Sides' between Novus & Luca Ponsato. The art acts as the visual representation of the masterfully written poem 'Two Sided' by Luca Ponsato.

Each bidder will receive the poem 'Two Sided' written by Luca Ponsato.

'Two Sided'  
Two sides to every fight  
Two sides to every struggle  
And when they start inside myself  
Part of me is the one in trouble  
As one side starts to grow  
The other must decay  
And if I get to where I want  
That other side must fade away  
Two sides to every battle 
Two sides to every war  
But I’ll continue to take these matchups  
Cause I know I’m worth fighting for.
